simplify the text to elementary: 
 text: The Seattle-based company has applied for its brand to be a top-level domain name (currently .com), but the South American governments argue this would prevent the use of this internet address for environmental protection, the promotion of indigenous rights and other public interest uses.
 
 to: Amazon has asked for its company name to be a top-level domain name (currently .com), but the South American governments say this would stop the use of this internet address for environmental protection, indigenous rights and other public interest uses.

simplify the text to elementary: 
 text: Allowing private companies to register geographical names as gTLDs to strengthen their brand or to profit from the meaning of these names is not, in our view, in the public interest, the Brazilian Ministry of Science and Technology said.
 
 to: Allowing private companies to register geographical names as gTLDs to profit from the meaning of these names is not, in our view, in the public interest, the Brazilian Ministry of Science and Technology said.

simplify the text to elementary: 
 text: Argentina is unhappy that the US outdoor clothing retailer, Patagonia, is claiming a domain name that has been known far longer as a region of spectacular beauty that also has its own parliament.
 
 to: Argentina is unhappy that the US outdoor clothing retailer, Patagonia, wants a domain name that has been known far longer as a region of spectacular beauty.

simplify the text to elementary: 
 text: The first approved domain names will probably be in use before the end of 2013.   
 
 to: The first new domain names will probably be in use before the end of 2013.

simplify the text to elementary: 
 text: The camps, where antisocial families will be rehoused for three to six months, have been called scum villages because the policy is similar to proposals from Geert Wilders, the far-right politician, who last year said that repeat offenders should be sent to a village for scum.
 
 to: The camps, where antisocial families will live for three to six months, have been called scum villages because last year Geert Wilders, the far-right politician, said that offenders should go to a village for scum.

simplify the text to elementary: 
 text: We want everyone to be who he and she is  whether they are gay and lesbian or resist violence and are then victims of harassment.
 
 to: We want everyone to be who he and she is  whether they are gay and lesbian or try to stop violence and are then victims of harassment.

simplify the text to elementary: 
 text: We as a society want to defend them.
 
 to: We want to defend them.

simplify the text to elementary: 
 text: According to Boer, the villages are not for a problem neighbour who has the stereo too loud on Saturday night but people who are extremely violent and intimidating and in a clear situation where a victim is being harassed again and again.
 
 to: According to Boer, the villages are not for a problem neighbour who has the stereo too loud on Saturday night but people who are very violent and in a clear situation where a victim is harassed again and again.

simplify the text to elementary: 
 text: But Boer insists that the government has learned from past mistakes and is not planning to house antisocial families together.
 
 to: But Boer says that the government has learned from past mistakes and is not planning to put antisocial families together.

simplify the text to elementary: 
 text: It would be more accurate to call them scum houses than scum villages, says Boer, because we dont want to put more than one of these families in the same area.
 
 to: They are scum houses not scum villages, says Boer, because we dont want to put more than one of these families in the same area.

simplify the text to elementary: 
 text: The city government expects to move around ten families a year into this programme, which starts in 2013.
 
 to: The city government expects to move about ten families a year, which starts in 2013.

simplify the text to elementary: 
 text: They are taken care of so the whole situation is not going to repeat at the new house they are in, says Boer. 
 
 to: We will take care of them so the whole situation is not going to repeat at the new house they are in, says Boer.

simplify the text to elementary: 
 text: She now has an album and a huge hit single, Show das Poderosas, which topped the charts and attracted 52 million YouTube views.
 
 to: She now has an album and a huge hit single, Show das Poderosas, which was number one in the charts and attracted 52 million YouTube views.

simplify the text to elementary: 
 text: This is a sensitive topic in this largely mixed-raced nation.
 
 to: This is a sensitive topic in this mixed-raced country.

simplify the text to elementary: 
 text: Brazil  one of the last big countries in the world to ban slavery  has the largest population of African descent outside Africa, but race and where your family come from are less important there than colour.
 
 to: Brazil has the largest population of African descent outside Africa, but race and where your family come from are less important there than colour.

simplify the text to elementary: 
 text: In Brazilian cities, white workers earn roughly twice as much as those of African descent.
 
 to: In Brazilian cities, white workers earn twice as much as workers of African descent.

simplify the text to elementary: 
 text: Most business and government executives are white, while most menial jobs are done by black and mixed-race workers.
 
 to: Most business and government executives are white, but black and mixed-race workers do most of the boring or dirty jobs.

simplify the text to elementary: 
 text: Maycon de Mattos Batista, a financial analyst who worked with Anitta while she was an intern, said there had been a huge change in Anittas image, but not of her colour.
 
 to: Maycon de Mattos Batista, a financial analyst who used to work with Anitta, said there has been a huge change in Anittas image, but not of her colour.

simplify the text to elementary: 
 text: I dont believe its whitening; its more the way they are producing her with makeup, hairstylists and the way she dresses, he said.
 
 to: I dont believe she is whiter; its more the makeup, hairstylists and the way she dresses, he said.

simplify the text to elementary: 
 text: It has mapped the worlds highest peaks, the ocean floor, the Amazon rainforest and even shown us a bit of North Korea.
 
 to: Google has made maps of the worlds highest mountains, the ocean floor, the Amazon rainforest and even shown us a bit of North Korea.

simplify the text to elementary: 
 text: They have with them their warmest winter clothes, a stack of laptop computers and an 18kg telescopic camera that they can fix to their backpacks.
 
 to: They have taken their warmest winter clothes, many laptop computers and an 18kg telescopic camera that they can fix to their backpacks.

simplify the text to elementary: 
 text: The team also walked along part of a 15km dead-end road known as the Road to Nowhere, despite warnings about the risk from polar bears and other wildlife.
 
 to: The team also walked along part of a 15km road known as the Road to Nowhere, despite warnings about meeting polar bears.

simplify the text to elementary: 
 text: Putting the PO box addresses on the map would mean the map would show all the companies, banks and schools in the same place, around the Canada Post building in the centre of town.
 
 to: Putting the PO box addresses on the map would mean the new map would show all the companies, banks and schools in the same place, around the Canada Post building in the centre of town.

simplify the text to elementary: 
 text: About 30 Inuit elders, business people and high-school pupils came one night to help correct such problems.
 
 to: About 30 Inuit elders, business people and high-school pupils helped Google to correct this problem.

simplify the text to elementary: 
 text: Arif Sayani, the towns Director of Planning, said the town would be able to use the maps as a promotional tool for those thinking of visiting or moving to the area.
 
 to: Arif Sayani, the towns Director of Planning, said that people who are thinking of visiting or moving to the area would be able to use the maps to see the area.

simplify the text to elementary: 
 text: The controversial auction of a Banksy mural that disappeared from the wall of a north London shop was dramatically stopped just moments before it was going to be sold.
 
 to: The auction of a Banksy painting that disappeared from the wall of a north London shop was stopped just moments before it was going to be sold.

simplify the text to elementary: 
 text: But auctioneer Frederic Thut, the owner of the Fine Arts Auction Miami art house, who had refused all week to give the name of the seller, announced that Slave Labour, together with a second work by the secretive British street artist, had been removed from sale at the auction.
 
 to: But Frederic Thut, the owner of the Fine Arts Auction Miami art house said that Slave Labour and a second work by the secretive British street artist were removed from sale at the auction.

simplify the text to elementary: 
 text: I will be writing to the auction house to clarify what happened and what will happen next, but for now we are really pleased that a community campaign in London has had an impact in the US.
 
 to: I will write to the auction house to find out what will happen next, but for now we are really pleased that a peoples campaign in London has had an impact in the US.

simplify the text to elementary: 
 text: Critics have accused the auction house of buying and selling stolen property but Thut said that the seller, who he described as a well known collector, was the rightful owner and that the sale was legal.
 
 to: Critics have said the auction house was buying and selling stolen property but Thut said that the seller was the real owner and that the sale was legal.

simplify the text to elementary: 
 text: A spokesperson for Poundland said it had no idea who removed the 4ft x 5ft mural from the side of one of its shops in London.
 
 to: Poundland said it had no idea who removed the 4ft x 5ft mural from the side of its shop.

simplify the text to elementary: 
 text: Banksy himself has not commented on the Slave Labour controversy, but he has previously condemned people who have tried to sell his artwork.
 
 to: Banksy himself has not commented on the sale of Slave Labour, but he has condemned people who have tried to sell his artwork in the past.

simplify the text to elementary: 
 text: Oxfam said the worlds poorest could be taken out of poverty several times over if the richest 100 billionaires would give away the money they made in 2012.
 
 to: Oxfam said the world could end poverty several times over if the richest 100 billionaires would give away the money they made in 2012.

simplify the text to elementary: 
 text: Without naming anyone, the charity argued that the $240bn made in 2012 by the richest 100 billionaires would be enough to end extreme poverty four times over.
 
 to: The charity said that the $240bn made in 2012 by the richest 100 billionaires would be enough to end extreme poverty four times over.

simplify the text to elementary: 
 text: The report found that the richest 1% had increased their incomes by 60% in the past 20 years.
 
 to: The report said that the richest 1% of people have increased their incomes by 60% in the past 20 years.

simplify the text to elementary: 
 text: In the UK, inequality is rapidly returning to levels not seen since the nineteenth century.
 
 to: In the UK, inequality is returning to levels not seen since the nineteenth century.

simplify the text to elementary: 
 text: In the US, the share of national income going to the top 1% has doubled since 1980 from 10 to 20%, the report says.
 
 to: In the US, the share of national income that goes to the top 1% of people has doubled since 1980 from 10% to 20%, the report says.

simplify the text to elementary: 
 text: Members of the richest 1% are estimated to cause as much as 10,000 times more pollution than the average US citizen.
 
 to: The richest 1% are estimated to cause 10,000 times more pollution than the average US citizen.

simplify the text to elementary: 
 text: Oxfam said world leaders should learn from countries such as Brazil, which has grown rapidly while reducing inequality.
 
 to: Oxfam said world leaders should learn from countries such as Brazil, which has grown quickly and reduced inequality at the same time.

simplify the text to elementary: 
 text: Back in 2005, when BlackBerry brought instant messaging to the mobile phone, the company was just entering its boom times.
 
 to: In 2005, BlackBerry brought instant messaging to the mobile phone and the company was just entering its period of success.

simplify the text to elementary: 
 text: While the iPhone was still just an idea, BlackBerrys innovations ensured its smartphone was one of Canadas biggest exports.
 
 to: Then, the iPhone was still just an idea and BlackBerrys innovations made its smartphone one of Canadas biggest exports.

simplify the text to elementary:

 to: The move to bring BlackBerry to the iPhone is four or five years too late, says James Gooderson, a technology blogger.

 text: Photos uploaded to Instagram get instant comments and Snapchats pictures, which selfdelete after ten seconds, have opened a world of other possibilities.
 
 to: Photos that are uploaded to Instagram get instant comments and Snapchats pictures have opened a world of other possibilities.

simplify the text to elementary:

 to: Its much more complex, says Benedict Evans, a digital media specialist.

simplify the text to elementary: 
 text: The low cost of buying and communicating on a BlackBerry is still an advantage.
 
 to: The low cost of buying and using a BlackBerry is still an advantage.

simplify the text to elementary:

 to: Bolivia has received a special exemption from the 1961 Convention on Drugs, the agreement that controls international drugs policy.

 to: South American Indians have chewed coca 3 leaves for hundreds of years.

simplify the text to elementary: 
 text: The leaves are said to provide energy and have medicinal qualities.
 
 to: The leaves give energy and have medicinal qualities.

 to: It is now part of the convention again, but with an exemption so that its indigenous people can continue chewing coca leaves.

simplify the text to elementary: 
 text: Bolivias return could be blocked only if a third or more of the 184 countries that have signed up to the convention opposed its request.
 
 to: Bolivias return could be blocked only if a third or more of the 184 countries that have signed the convention opposed the exemption.

 to: It is legal to grow coca leaves in Bolivia.

simplify the text to elementary: 
 text: Male bosses are paid bonuses double the size of those given to female colleagues in identical jobs.
 
 to: Male bosses are paid bonuses double the size of bonuses given to female colleagues in the same jobs.

simplify the text to elementary: 
 text: This means that men get salary top-ups of 141,500 more than women over their working lives.
 
 to: This means that men get bonuses of 141,500 more than women over their working lives.

simplify the text to elementary:

simplify the text to elementary:

 to: The scheme has only attracted 120 companies in nearly two years.

simplify the text to elementary: 
 text: Health warnings that cover nearly two-thirds of cigarette packs and a ban on menthol cigarettes in the EU have come a step nearer after a vote in the European Parliament.
 
 to: The European Parliament have said that health warnings will cover nearly two-thirds of cigarette packs and there will be a ban on menthol cigarettes in the EU.

simplify the text to elementary:

 to: Maria van der Hoeven, Executive Director of the IEA, said that the amount of coal we use continues to grow each year and, if no changes are made, coal will catch oil within ten years.

 to: The IEA says that China and India will drive world coal use in the next five years, and India will probably overtake the US as the worlds second biggest consumer.
